titleStmt.title: SII 6.287: original edition by K. V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 287. (A.R. No. 5 of 1898). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kovicaiyakampavikkiramavarmmarkku yāṇṭu Eṭṭāvatu meṟkūrnāṭṭu AtiAraiyamaṅkalattu Arayantaipramāṇiyeṉ nāṉ Uttaramerucaturvvetimaṅkalattu
vāmanacceri Eṭuppitta maṇṭapattu mahāviṣṇukkaḷ Iruntaperumāṉaṭikaḷukku nāṉ Arccanābhogamākak kuṭutta nilam maticūtaṉaccerik koṟuttalaik koṇṭayakramavittarpa
kkal Ūriṉ teṟku parameśvaravatiyiṉ meṟku Oṉpatāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu mutaṟ catukkattu viṟṟukkoṇṭuṭaiya pāṭakam Iraṇṭiṉāṟ kuḻi nāṉūṟṟeṇpatu kuḻiyum Iccatukkatte tiru
nāraṇaccerik kārampicceṭṭuc civatāmotiraccaturvvetiyā ruḷḷiṭṭārpakkal viṟṟukkoṇṭuṭaiya pāṭakam Oṉṟiṉāl Irunūṟṟunāṟpatu kuḻiyum Iccatukkatte vāmaṉacceric ci
ṟupuḷḷuvaṉ tomaṇiccaturvvetiyār makaṉ kecuvakravittaṉpakkal viṟṟukkoṇṭuṭaiya pāṭakam Oṉṟiṉāl Irunūṟṟunāṟpatu kuḻiyumāka nālu pāṭakattālumākat toḷḷā
yirattaṟupatu kuḻiyum Ivvūr śrīgovarddhaṉattu vaikhānasaN śrīdharabhaṭṭaṉ makaṉ tāmotirapaṭṭaṉ pūrvvāhṇat toru tiruvamirtum nāyaṟupāṭu Oruviḷakku miṭṭut tevarmuṉpu pala kaṇiyu maḻivu nīkkit tevaraiyum putukka śrīgovarddhaṉattu vaikhānasa nātrayaṉ
putukka veṇṭu nāḷ putukki Ipparicu Ārādhittu Uṇpāṉāka Udakatāraiyāl peṟṟuṭaiya tāmotirapaṭṭaṉuṭaiya puttirapeḷatrādikaḷukke Urittāka Uṇṇak kuṭutteṉ meṟcollappaṭṭa piramāṇiyeṉ Uttarameruccatturvvetimaṅkalattu sabhaiyo meḻuttu I
piramāṇi kuṭut=ta tevadānattukku vaikhānasaN śrīdharabhaṭṭaṉ makaṉ tāmotirabhaṭṭaṉ pakkal Epperppaṭṭa Iṟaikkum poṉ Aṟakkoṇṭu Iṟaiyiliyāka paṇittuk kuṭuttom mahāsabhaiyom sabhai paṇippa Eḻutineṉ śrīpuruṣa Ācāryyaneṉ ..
Digital edition of SII 6.287 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
